sig_info: If at least 3 unique Dimensions are active, America Chavez becomes Supercharged, granting the following bonuses:
+12 to 50% Dimensional Energy Infusion potency.
Launching a Special 2 during a Heavy Attack provides +1 stack of whichever Dimension was activated.

PARALLEL DIMENSIONS:: Each hit of a Heavy Attack switches the dormant Dimension in the order they appear below.
When the Heavy Attack ends, or if launching a Special Attack during a Heavy Attack, activate the Dimension for 30 seconds.
Utopian Parallel: Reduce Opponents Fury, Armor Up, Precision, and Cruelty Buff Potency by 70%.
Dark Dimension: Reflect 40% of hit damage taken as Energy Damage. Damage is capped at 156.75.
Negative Zone: Reduce Opponents Ability Power Rate by 60%
Matching Dimensions suffer -20% Duration for each stack.
Whenever affected by a Wither Debuff, remove the most recently activated Parallel Dimension.
While Defending a Quest Node, if activating a Dimension that already has 2 active stacks, she activates 1 random unopened Dimension.
DIMENSIONAL ENERGY INFUSION - MAX 9 STAC: For each unique Parallel Dimension on America Chavez and each Buff on the Opponent, gain the following benefits.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Charge a Heavy Attack after landing any non combo ending hit of a Basic Attack combo to inflict a Passive Stun for 0.75 seconds. Heavy Attacks launched this way generate 25% less Power on Hit.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each unique Parallel Dimension creates a Passive Power Gain effect generating 40% of a bar of Power over 1.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: For the final 3 hits of this Special Attack, America Chavez opens a Portal to an additional Big Bang Dimension. Dealing a burst of Energy Damage equal to 50% hit damage dealt.
These hits gain a bonus effect based on the last Dimension activated:
Utopian Parallel: Deal 69.6 additional damage on Hit.
Dark Dimension: Regenerate 12% of hit damage dealt.
Negative Zone: Unblockable.

While Defending a Quest Node, if activating a Dimension that already has 2 active stacks, she activates 1 random unopened Dimension.
DIMENSIONAL ENERGY INFUSION - MAX 9 STAC: For each unique Parallel Dimension on America Chavez and each Buff on the Opponent, gain the following benefits.
HEAVY ATTACKS: Charge a Heavy Attack after landing any non combo ending hit of a Basic Attack combo to inflict a Passive Stun for 0.75 seconds. Heavy Attacks launched this way generate 25% less Power on Hit.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each unique Parallel Dimension creates a Passive Power Gain effect generating 40% of a bar of Power over 1.50 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: For the final 3 hits of this Special Attack, America Chavez opens a Portal to an additional Big Bang Dimension. Dealing a burst of Energy Damage equal to 50% hit damage dealt.
These hits gain a bonus effect based on the last Dimension activated:
Utopian Parallel: Deal 1949.6 additional damage on Hit.
Dark Dimension: Regenerate 12% of hit damage dealt.
Negative Zone: Unblockable.
